issues.description: The template declares PersonService.save(...) as private, but other template artifacts (PersonResource and PersonServiceTest) and the problem specification expect to call personService.save(...). This visibility mismatch prevents compilation and execution (PersonResource and tests cannot access a private method). The solution repository declares save(...) as public, indicating the intended visibility is public.
issues.suggested_fix: Change the visibility of PersonService.save(Person) in the template from private to public so that PersonResource and the tests can call personService.save(...). This matches the solution and the problem statement's usage (e.g., createPerson in PersonResource and unit tests).
